total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the pattern in the input grid. The pattern seems to be a repeating sequence of numbers (1, 2, 5, 1, 8, 2, 1) in each row, with some rows entirely filled with 1s.
Q2: Identify the changes between the input and output grids in the examples. It appears that certain sections of the pattern are replaced with 0s in the output grid.
Q3: Determine the rule for which sections of the pattern are replaced with 0s. In the examples, it seems that the sections replaced with 0s are always in the same position relative to the pattern.
Q4: Apply the rule determined in Q3 to the input grid of the quiz to generate the output grid.
